title: what was the cheapest & most filling food u were able to find on campus/near campus
content: aside from the mess food cuz i really cannot be putting more of that shit into my body

comments.body:
Check an Eatery called "BS Home foods"

They sell half sambar/rasam rice at 25rs only and you can buy a chapathi which costs for 15rs... your complete lunch is done at just 40rs

  
And recently they have started to sell tasty bhajjis too, each costing only 5rs each.

Breakfast- hotel siddharth( hands down the best in the area) 
For non veg- Devanna hotel 
For snacks- Stop N Joy or the chats guys near the entrance
Make sure the food is healthy. And eat some eggs along with it
Honestly there is this place called Annakuteera around 3km from college, I swear to god, itâ€™s got the best food you can find in Banashankari, itâ€™s been there since ages!
infront of be block.u'll get free cockroach too
Udupi Ruchi Grand is the nearest to PESU and is also good.. but I agree, Anna Kuteera is the best around.
Maybe, but I have been going to Anna kuteera since 2016 so I am used to it..
